author: leoniDEV
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

The mklink command is able to create junction point using volume GUID instead of volume letter with a syntax like `mklink /J %USERPROFILE%\src \\?\Volume{953caf26-bdb1-42fa-ba14-a392223eb61a}\src\`.

The `New-Item` PowerShell cmdlet cannot work with the volume GUID, it would be useful if `New-Item` could also create junction/symlink using the volume GUID

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_
title: Make Junction/symlink using volume GUID working
